title: Setting the scene: landscape spaces (Chris Kennedy and Stephen Curtis)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion picture locations

abstract: Interviews by AFTRS and ACMI with production designers Chris Kennedy and Stephen Curtis on their work on landscapes on film for the Setting the Scene exhibition
description: Interviews with Chris Kennedy and Stephen Curtis, Australian production designers on their work. Chris Kennedy talks about the two different approaches he took for two films, the building of a town in The Proposition and finding already existing locations for The Road. Stephen Curtis talks about his approach to production designing on his work on Bedevil and Night Cries. Prodcued by AFTRS and ACMI for ACMI's Setting the Scene exhibition.
